issue.title: Freevee Missed Ad Problem

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.12

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.amazon.com/gp/video/detail/B00C17815Q/ref=atv_3p_fre_c_FCil6v_2_1?jic=36%7CCgtmcmVld2l0aGFkcxIMc3Vic2NyaXB0aW9u

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<![freevee ad](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/117128071/7b2cfc19-a856-4881-830e-e1a3ebfe523f)>

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>




### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Not a request to fix, it's purely for consideration by the development team. There is a random(occasional)  minor overlap in some sections where the ads have been skipped, it restarts at a start point before the ad is inserted so some of the content is replayed for 10-20 secs or so . In another situation, it is possible to review a potential fix if it isn't time-consuming,  as mentioned in the last comment, auto skip before the series episode has ended to the next episode does occur without giving the viewer the option to cancel.

issue.title: Zoechip3.org there are still ads on it and it opens pop ups when you click on the site
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.6

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers, Annoyances  pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www3.zoechip.com/movie/spirited-90331

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment> Hi so im going on zoechip3.org to try and watch a movie and even with my adguard up to date, latest version, and Mobil ads filter and base filter it still has ads on the site that i annoyingly have to keep closing only to open pop us which i have to close of those and if you click on the site it opens pop up tabs 

you literally have to face a couple pop up tabs to finally be able to use the site any help to this would be very appreciative 
3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary> 

<!-- paste screenshot here [-->]

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary
![95476ADB-CCD6-4D17-83F5-5CEE56473FD7](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/124982114/24651f2c-81de-49ea-9afa-de81ac4976a1)
>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: www.twitch.tv

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.twitch.tv/tsm_imperialhal](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Ftsm_imperialhal) ### Comment > This is a problem with whole twitch domain, if you watch streams with adguard adblock and streamers ad starts to play i cant see it but video starts buffering, i need to close my adblock watch the ad and then start it again if i want to continue watching ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/YWw0KNv.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/bvyCoiS.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.12 Browser: | Chrome AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `System`
Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection Userscripts: | https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js,
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.twitch.tv/hasanabi](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.twitch.tv%2Fhasanabi) ### Comment > Every time I change to a different channel I immediately get a new add and now I'm getting adds every few minutes. > I tried adguard extra before, same result. I uninstalled because it takes memory and does nothing. ### Screenshots
